backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking site features to related source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme variable definitions using OKLCH values for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app root returning HomePage wrapped in a QueryClientProvider.
Footer component with branding, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution.
Layout wrapper providing main content area and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, storage, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks with no current logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind theme with emerald/teal design system and light/dark mode variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing providers and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Smart Janghai homepage with hero image, intro content, and themed feature sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Project state describing Smart Janghai website requirements, existing features, and pending hero image request.
